msg_en:
"Future Theatre: New Laguage, Took and Audience" Conference is about to start at Le Méridien Taipei 2F. 

Registration is now full, we welcome you to watch the confernce live on the official website. 


Joris Mathieu | Director, Théâtre Nouvelle Génération - Centre dramatique national de Lyon 
Huang Yi | Founder & Artistic Director of Huang Yi Studio 
Su Wen-Chi | Founder of YiLab. 

Moderator: Siraya Pai | Theatre Critic

msg_zh:
【展覽爆報】始多利交易所開玩，獎品萌翻

夾娃娃、玩拉霸，用故事交易代幣，贏得《用九柑仔店》《老派約會之必要》等作金句撲克牌，體驗小說漫畫到電視劇等流行文化、跨界轉議的萌萌貓趣味展。活動需註冊參加，慢來玩不到😻
